Purimaṃ dhammacakkhunti purimapadaṃ bhagavato dhammacakkhuṃ sādheti kilesārīnaṃ saṃsāracakkassa ca arānaṃ hatabhāvadīpanato. Dutiyaṃ padaṃ buddhacakkhuṃ sādheti sammāsambuddhasseva taṃ sambhavato. Tatiyaṃ padaṃ samantacakkhuṃ sādheti savāsanasabbakilesappahānadīpanato. ‘‘Sammāsambuddho’’ti hi vatvā ‘‘vivaṭṭacchado’’ti vacanaṃ buddhabhāvāvahameva sabbakilesappahānaṃ vibhāvetīti.
